svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2023-04-13T15:21:35.053Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/112.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="faLfW72PKDl3FhjT1vj9" version="21.1.7" type="github"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="YsokiFbN5qdAHcC0NkKa"> <mxGraphModel dx="1094" dy="649" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1600" pageHeight="900" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-1" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">Subtask</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1;container=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="40" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-2" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">Examples</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;fontSize=16;fontStyle=1;container=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="40" width="680" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-3" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;"><div style="font-size: 14px;">Training machine learning</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">models</div></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fontSize=14;fillColor=none;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="79.99705035971223" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-4" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Using one of the following methods: Linear Regression, Logistic Regression, Decision</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">Trees, Random Forest, XGBoost, Support Vector Machines, K-means,&nbsp;</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">K-Nearest&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">Neighbors, Neural Networks, Principal Component Analysis, Naive Bayes Classifier,&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">Lasso/Ridge regression, etc.</span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fontSize=14;fillColor=none;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="79.99705035971223" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-5" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">Fitting probabilistic or statistical models<br style="font-size: 14px;"></div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="159.99848920863312" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-6" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Fitting a probabilistic graphical model</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Testing hypotheses via data experiments</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Applying a dimensionality reduction on a dataset to facilitate model</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">training or gather insights</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="159.99848920863312" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-7" value="Training deep learning models" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="239.99992805755394" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-8" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Using deep learning for a domain-specific application such as fraud detection, text</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">summarization, machine translation, speech recognition, or object&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">classification, detection, or segmentation</span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Tuning hyperparameters involved in neural network optimization</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="239.99992805755394" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-9" value="Accelerating training" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="320.0013669064748" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-10" value="- Setting up code to train a model on multiple machines in parallel" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="320.0013669064748" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-11" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">Defining evaluation metrics</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">(usually also involves a data</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">product manager)</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="400.0028057553957" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-12" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Choosing F1-score to evaluate a modelâ€™s performance on a classification task</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Implementing evaluation metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall,&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">intersection over union, or mean average precision (mAP)</span></div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="400.0028057553957" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-13" value="Speeding up prediction time" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="480.0042446043165" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-14" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Applying techniques such as pruning, quantization, or compression to&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">reduce memory requirements</span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Running inference speed vs. accuracy experiments on a model</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="480.0042446043165" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-15" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">Iterating over the virtuous</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">cycle of machine learning</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">projects: Idea, Code, Exper-</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">iment</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="560.0056834532375" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-16" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Translating a business problem into a machine learning problem. For&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">instance, depending on the quality and quantity of accessible data, an&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">end-to-end network might lead to better results than a pipeline network&nbsp;</span></div><div style="font-size: 14px;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">- Implementing the three-step cycle of ideating with your team, coding&nbsp;</span><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 14px;">to set up experiments, analyzing results</span></div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="559.9956834532375" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-17" value="Searching hyperparameters" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="640.0071223021582" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-18" value="- Organizing experiments to get results in the shortest time period<br style="font-size: 14px;"><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Setting up hyperparameter search experiments using tools such as</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">AutoML</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="640.0071223021582" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-19" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">Keeping your knowledge up</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">to date</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="720.0085611510791" width="240" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="oSDInQfKkOwpNfLERN2i-20" value="<div style="font-size: 14px;">- Reading research papers</div><div style="font-size: 14px;">- Watching conference lectures or attending conferences</div>" style="rounded=0;html=1;fontSize=14;align=left;labelBackgroundColor=none;fillColor=none;whiteSpace=wrap;container=0;spacingLeft=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="279.99851851851855" y="720.0085611510791" width="680" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
